units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S5U01 — Adaptations for survival

units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Chemical Sciences, so this Y5 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: HVAC Technician
careers.whyThis: HVAC Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards HVAC Technician you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. HVAC Technician is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see HVAC Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Surveying Technician
careers.whyThis: Surveying Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Surveying Technician you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. Surveying Technician is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Surveying Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: Marine Biologist will help you build your Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Marine Biologist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. Marine Biologist is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Marine Biologist now and understand what to work towards.
